sentences.en: " One thing I'm not mistaken about today is that your aunt accused me unfairly. "
sentences.cn: 鸿渐道: “今天我不认错的,是你姑母冤枉我. ”

sentences.en: An industrial tribunal has no jurisdiction to decide whether an employee was fairly or unfairly dismissed.
sentences.cn: 劳资仲裁法庭无权判定解雇是否正当。

sentences.en: And that's going to require some very hard choices. And we're going to have to do that in a way that does not add unfairly to the burdens that the average American already faces.
sentences.cn: 他还称,"这就需要作出一些十分困难的选择.我们达到此目的所采取的方式,将不会向普通美国人已面临的负担中,增加不公平的累赘."

sentences.en: Any man deserves redress if he has been injured unfairly.
sentences.cn: 任何人若蒙受不公平的损害都应获得赔偿.

sentences.en: Everyone feels resentment at being treated unfairly.
sentences.cn: 每个人都会为受到不公平的待遇而感到愤慨.

sentences.en: He had unfairly presented a caricature of my views.
He unfairly blamed Frances for the failure.
sentences.cn: 他把失败归咎于弗朗西丝，这不公平。

sentences.en: I was indignant because I felt that I had been punished unfairly.
sentences.cn: 我非常愤慨,因为我觉得对我的惩罚是不公平的.

sentences.en: Most of the victims felt that they had been dismissed unfairly.
sentences.cn: 大多数受害者感到解雇他们是不公平的.

sentences.en: Some shops marked up the goods unfairly.
sentences.cn: 有几家商店的货价提高得不公道.

sentences.en: Students have no way of getting back at a teacher who marks their work unfairly.
sentences.cn: 学生无法报复评分不公道的老师.

sentences.en: The court ruled that Ms Hill had been unfairly dismissed.
sentences.cn: 法庭裁定解雇希尔女士是不公正的.

sentences.en: The interest of usury is unfairly high.
sentences.cn: 高利贷的利息惊人得高.

sentences.en: The workers voiced their indignation at being unfairly dismissed.
sentences.cn: 对被不公正解雇一事工人们表示愤慨.

sentences.en: Workers who have been unfairly dismissed may claim compensation.
sentences.cn: 被无理开除的工人可以要求补偿.

trans.tran_cn: 不公平地，不公正地，不正当地
